eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\mathbb{G}&\rightarrow &\cases{\mbox{non--linear action on
$\phi^I=\{z^\alpha,\,q^u\}$}\,,\begin{array}{l}
  \alpha =1,\ldots ,n\,, \\
  u=1,\ldots ,4r\,,
\end{array}  \cr
\mbox{linear action } \left(\matrix{F^\Lambda_{\mu\nu}\cr G_{\Sigma|\mu\nu}}\right)\rightarrow {\bf g}\cdot  \left(\matrix{F^\Lambda_{\mu\nu}\cr G_{\Sigma|\mu\nu}}\right)\,,\,\,\Lambda,\Sigma=0,\dots, n\,,}\nonumber\\&&\nonumber\\
{\bf g} &=& \left(\matrix{A & B\cr C & D}\right)\in
\mathbb{G}\hookrightarrow {\rm Sp}(2(n+1),\mathbb{R})\,.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 \mathcal{K}(z,\overline{z})&=&-{\rm log}\left({\rm i}\langle V\vert \overline{V}\rangle\right) \,\,\,;\,\,\,\,
V(z^\alpha)= \left(\matrix{X^\Lambda(z^\alpha)\cr
F_{\Sigma}(z^\alpha)}\right) \nonumber\,\,;\,\, \langle V\vert
\overline{V}\rangle=\overline{X}^\Lambda F_{\Lambda}-X^\Lambda
\overline{F}_{\Lambda}\,.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
V(\phi) &=& \left(g_{\alpha\bar{\beta}}k^\alpha_\Lambda k^{\bar{\beta}}_\Sigma+4h_{uv}k^u_\Lambda k^{v}_\Sigma\right)\bar{L}^\Lambda L^\Sigma+\left(U^{\Lambda\Sigma}-3\bar{L}^\Lambda L^\Sigma\right)\mathcal{P}^x_\Lambda\mathcal{P}^x_\Sigma\,,\nonumber\\
L^\Sigma (z,\bar{z})& =& e^{\mathcal{K}/2}X^\Sigma
(z)\,\,;\,\,\,\nabla_{\bar{\alpha}} L^\Sigma\equiv
\left(\partial_{\bar{\alpha}}-\frac12(\partial_{\bar{\alpha}}\mathcal{K})\right)L^\Sigma
=0\,.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\mathbb{G}&\rightarrow &\cases{\mbox{non--linear action on
$\phi^I=\{z^\alpha,\,q^u\}$}\,,\begin{array}{l}
  \alpha =1,\ldots ,n\,, \\
  u=1,\ldots ,4r\,,
\end{array}  \cr

{\bf g} &=& \left(\matrix{A & B\cr C & D}\right)\in
\mathbb{G}\hookrightarrow {\rm Sp}(2(n+1),\mathbb{R})\,.
\
